description: Christopher tells it like it is: 'It's fun being someone else than yourself on video.' So let's see who this macho mocha bon bon is today. He tugs on the fleshy foreskin, tweaks his perky tits and continues jerking off, faster and tighter, until Mr. Happy sneezes globs of jism. Whoa! title: Christopher Ashlee, Scene #01
